pageContext.claim: “So, if we have thousands or hundreds of thousands of people that get better just by, you know, sitting around and even going to work -- some of them go to work, but they get better.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump later denied that he was urging people who were sick with covid-19 to go to work, but it certainly sounded like it. In any case, his comment was contrary to advice from medical experts who said that anyone ill should not come in contact with others because the coronavirus is highly contagious and can kill at random.
